thread.section_title: Caravel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Well presented
thread.title_full: Well presented - Review of Caravel Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Stuzdd
title: Well presented
text:
A lovely hotel just on the outskirts of the main tourist part of Rome. The hotel was very clean. The staff polite and helpful. The breakfast area was clean with a continental style breakfast. As much as you want to eat. The room we had was roomy with a very modern en suit . Nice comfy bed with TV . No coffee or tea making equipment but it did have an hair dryer. .
The free wi-fi was poor though on my phone, I often had no reception.
Getting into Rome on foot would take around 40 minutes, there was a bus service across the road for 6-7 Euros. You have to pre buy a ticket from a kiosk near by .
All in all a pleasant 3 day stay.
